traits.Keen Smell: The panther has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
traits.Pounce: If the panther moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.
